channel.title: Making my server
channel.description: Ok, I know MupeScape v1-v2 we unsuccesful so I've decided to come back to moparscape and try to make a v3 I just wanted to have a few suggestions on the server (its going to be a solo-project just like v1-v2 not hiring sorry.) (right now I am using RicScape v5 source planning on editing it alot.) I wanted some of your people's suggestion: Where should I have the new starter area? What skills should I make work pefectly? (firemaking, woodcutting, etc.. ) What new commands should I come out with? Right Now I'm kind of out of question to ask but I'll edit this later with more questions --Mupescape

item.title: Making my server
item.dc:creator: @czj2_0 czj2 0
item.description:
@czj2_0 wrote:

I reaaaly wanna know how to perfect woodcutting.
I’m kinda new tho, so I don’t know about you or your server…
If your playing Mopar because your tired of RuneScape, then maybe you should put it in Varrock.
Varrock looked better back then…Damn it Jagex…
They also took away pking, so Mopar ownszs now.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

[quote=“liek amg, post:2, topic:180207”]starter area: catherby

skill perfectly working: fletching.

commands:idk

,owned,liek amg.[/quote]
Ok fletching sounds like a pretty good Idea, just not so sure about catherby let me think it over ,K ?

item.title: Making my server
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

Ok, I know MupeScape v1-v2 we unsuccesful so I’ve decided to come back to moparscape and try to make a v3
I just wanted to have a few suggestions on the server (its going to be a solo-project just like v1-v2 not hiring sorry.)
(right now I am using RicScape v5 source planning on editing it alot.)
I wanted some of your people’s suggestion:
Where should I have the new starter area?
What skills should I make work pefectly? (firemaking, woodcutting, etc… )
What new commands should I come out with?
Right Now I’m kind of out of question to ask but I’ll edit this later with more questions
–Mupescape

Read full topic
